description: Identify vulnerabilities in smart contracts in the Near ecosystem.

welcome.description: The Near AI Agent rAIxon Sheriff in the Near AI ecosystem is designed to identify vulnerabilities in smart contracts, both the Near blockchain and other blockchains. In addition to well-known data, in this case, a knowledge base with vulnerability codes created on sources such as CVE, CISA KEV, EPSS, BCCC, etc. is used to expand the expert capabilities of the rAIxon Sheriff Agent.
welcome.title: Identify vulnerabilities in smart contracts in the Near ecosystem

name: near-ai-monitor
